name: modnotes
short: A rework of the ModNotes cog by Jojo#7790
description: Allow moderators to make notes about users
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores "notes" on users via ids.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing ModNotes.
This cog allows moderators to add notes to users to keep track of things.
